roleset.name: utter mocking or scoffing words, jeer, taunt
roleset.note: GIBE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gibe' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 33. (from gibe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: I playfully gibed him about obscure predictions he had made years ago in other articles, and was prepared to thoughtfully discuss his most recent column.
example.arg: about obscure predictions he had made years ago in other articles,
